column5: The Riverhouse provides a comfortable setting when in our area, ideally located near both Granbury and Glen Rose.  Enjoy Country living at its finest. Those staying at The Riverhouse can sit down to a unique and tranquil experience, ideally based for those who want to explore nearby when looking for adventure and a bite to eat, or just relax and rejuvenate. For guests with day trips planned, the guestroom offers  a fresh breakfast to start your day.
